channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Aide And Lawyers Criminally Charged In Wisconsin Fake Elector Scheme
item.description: A Trump aide and two of his lawyers have been criminally charged for their roles in the 2020 fake elector scheme in Wisconsin.

item.title: Fairfax County, Virginia: Public Schools, Limited English Proficiency, and the Opportunity Cost of Mass Migration
item.description: In economics, opportunity cost is defined as “the potential benefits that a business, an investor, or an individual consumer misses out on when choosing one alternative over another.” A dollar spent on A cannot be simultaneously spent on B. To read the rest of the article click here The post Fairfax County, Virginia: Public Schools, Limited English Proficiency, and the Opportunity Cost of Mass Migration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Stephen Colbert Audience Chants Lock Him Up In Response To Trump Conviction
item.description: Stephen Colbert asked his audience for their thoughts on Trump going to jail, and the crowd chanted lock him up.

item.title: Massachusetts Response to its Migrant Crisis: Offer Even More Benefits
item.description: If any state in America proves the axiom that “things in motion stay in motion” it’s Massachusetts. What else but perpetual motion physics can explain the logic behind the Bay State’s non-stop granting of benefits to illegal aliens? To read the rest of the article click here The post Massachusetts Response to its Migrant Crisis: Offer Even More Benefits appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Jon Stewart Goes Off On The Media With A Classic Rant
item.description: Jon Stewart showed how the corporate media has dropped the ball by pretending like reality doesn’t exist to coddle Republicans. Stewart played several clips of people in the media claiming that there are two realities in the country, and then he responded, “No! You are thinking of the multi-verse. We are all living in one...

item.title: Illegal Aliens Call Lyft Ride After Getting Sick of Waiting for Border Patrol to Pick them Up
item.description: In yet another alarming display of the Biden administration’s failure to secure our southern border, Fox News’s Bill Melugin caught a group of Colombian illegal aliens using a ride-hailing app, To read the rest of the article click here The post Illegal Aliens Call Lyft Ride After Getting Sick of Waiting for Border Patrol to Pick them Up appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Convicted Felon Trump Still Isn’t Campaigning
item.description: Trump complained that his criminal trial was keeping him off of the campaign trail, but the trial has been over for days, and Donald Trump has held zero campaign events.

item.title: Two Illegal Aliens Attempt to Breach U.S. Military Base, Dangerous Trend Continues Under Biden
item.description: Two Jordanian illegal aliens are in ICE custody awaiting deportation proceedings after attempting to breach the Marine Corps base in Quantico, Virginia, earlier this month. To read the rest of the article click here The post Two Illegal Aliens Attempt to Breach U.S. Military Base, Dangerous Trend Continues Under Biden appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .

item.title: Biden Busts House Republicans For Violating Agreement By Trying To Defund The Police
item.description: In a Statement of Administration Policy, the Biden administration called out House Republicans for violating their spending agreement and trying to cut funding for law enforcement.

item.title: Déjà Vu: Two Middle Eastern Illegal Aliens Attempt to Enter Secure Virginia Military Facility in a Box Truck
item.description: On May 3, two Jordanian illegal aliens were apprehended as they attempted to enter the Marine Corps base in Quantico, Virginia, in a box truck. The two were posing as Amazon delivery drivers, although Amazon denies that they were employed by the company. To read the rest of the article click here The post Déjà Vu: Two Middle Eastern Illegal Aliens Attempt to Enter Secure Virginia Military Facility in a Box Truck appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com .
